name: 4x4 Evo 2
description: 4x4 EVO 2 - Welcome to the dirt-grinding, real world of racing Off-roading in the new adventure system puts your racing skills to the test, as you explore, rescue, and compete through 3 new career modes. Pick a base truck to compete in a series of off-road races and win fast cash to deck out your truck with a an inventory of over 90 real-world parts to increase your power. Experience the wild, off-road adventures of 4x4 EVO 2 in over 32 expansive, outdoor courses set in a variety of diverse locations around the world. Trek into unpredictable, jaw-dropping environments and diverse mission-based adventures ranging from locating a downed plane in the Grand Canyon to the discovery of a lost Mayan city in a Central American jungle. 4x4 EVO2 roars onto the Xboxâ€™ video game system as a first-wave launch title this Fall.
